@@ -522,1 +522,1 @@
-        return
+        var firstTime =
@@ -525,0 +525,9 @@
+        var updating =
+           "`$ git checkout pull/" + pr.id() + "`\n" +
+           "`$ git pull " + repoUrl + " " + pr.fetchRef() + "`\n";
+
+        return "To checkout this PR locally:\n" +
+                firstTime +
+                "\n" +
+                "To update a local copy of the PR:\n" +
+                updating;
